group_1.textRight: You alright, Yuna...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
It's just a little lonely.
Torayamachi is small enough to fit in my bedroom @now...
My apologies, I made things awkward...

group_1.textRight: So, what did you call us here for...?

group_1.textLeft: You know that already. Only three days remain.
It's about time you all left for Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textRight: How can we do that after fighting alongside you for @so long...?
She's right. We've been working together to make Futatsugi a peaceful place.

group_1.textLeft: We're past the point of trying for that...
Our goal is to work together to find out why the @Witches had disappeared...
And figure out what to do if it happens again...
It was never about defeating Ryuugasaki and ruling @the city...

group_1.textRight: We know that...but...

group_1.textLeft: My last wish is for all of you to go to Ryuugasaki...
The only thing Juri wants is to fight me once @I'm fully recovered...

group_1.textRight: What do you think will happen if Ryuugasaki takes @over the city...?

group_1.textLeft: They'll have what they want then,
so Magical Girls won't have to fight each other @anymore, and the city will become peaceful.

group_1.textRight: What about the disappearance of the Witches...?

group_1.textLeft: Ryuugasaki will keep investigating.

group_1.textRight: ...I doubt that.

group_1.textLeft: You have to stop being stubborn, or you'll get @yourself killed for nothing.
You all have families, right?
Think about your future with them. Now is not @the time to fight against Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm sorry. I'm...really sorry...

group_1.textCenter: But even if I leave you, you'll always be special to me.

group_1.textRight: Yuna... I'm sorry I can't do anything for you now... @Thank you for everything you did for us.

group_1.textLeft: See you around...

group_1.textRight: Everybody left...

group_1.textLeft: You should go too, Hikaru.

group_1.textRight: What are you talking about? No way.

group_1.textLeft: Weren't you listening to what I just told them?

group_1.textRight: I think you're misunderstandin' things.
You're all mine, Yuna.
So I'm the one who decides whether I let you go @or not.
It's not your choice.

group_1.textLeft: Then get rid of me.

group_1.textRight: Not a chance.

group_1.textLeft: That's too cruel to me, to your family, and to @everyone else...

group_1.textRight: I know...
But if I die, I'll be waitin' for you in Hell.
And if you die, I'm goin' to Hell with you.

group_1.textLeft: We'll be in Hell either way, huh...

group_1.textRight: That's where all Futatsugi Magical Girls will end up.

group_1.textLeft: Well then, shall we walk down Yomotsuhirasaka together?

group_1.textRight: Walk down where...?

group_1.textLeft: The path to the land of the dead.
